price: Ampa sε Yεtwerεε no wͻ Dawid Nwom no mu wͻ afutusεm (a yεde maa Mose) no akyi sε: “Me nkoa apapafoͻ no na wͻbɛdi adeε wͻ asaase no soͻ.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَتَبۡنَا فِي ٱلزَّبُورِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ أَنَّ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ يَرِثُهَا عِبَادِيَ ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad katabnā fī al-zabūri min baʿdi al-dhik'ri anna al-arḍa yarithuhā ʿibādiya al-ṣāliḥūna
